content.detailedDescription: Up 5am having coffee. looking at moon and stars westerly. strange pulsing red green white,starlike,got binocs it was not natural. first thought plane,but didn't move at all,stayed in same place whole time. really had noticeable pulsing red green white lights seemed to get bigger then smaller. triangular shaped i thought but then couldn't tell. i kept thinking this was not natural and wanted to call someone, but didn't. lost sight as sun came up, but did notice it had moved slightly to south and north without realizing it.   i don't know if this is even worth reporting just wanted someone else to know. watched the whole time thru binocs, will look again tmrw morn.  really have never seen that before am always up looking at morn sky.   really couldn't believe what i was seeing.
content.summary: Pulsing red green white triangle then oblong looked at w/ binocs whole time lost sight as light came

content.detailedDescription:
I drove from a friend's home at about 8pm in i believe january or february of 2014 on thornhill st., in sun city, ca. i noticed a strange octagonal shapeded object moving very slowly, around 11-15 mph above the roofs of the houses on the left side of the street. i was stunned, as i had never seen this before and thought it might be a helicopter, or a new aircraft, but as i stopped the car and rolled the window down to get a better look, it was neither one of these, and no propellers or wings.There was no sound at all. it just moved very very slowly, almost hovering, which was weird to me because i knew our aircrafts do not move that slow in a straight path. marsh air force base is several miles away, and i also took that into consideration. the shape was strange to me. i counted the points of the shape, which was eight. it was dark out, but there were lights surrounding the craft in white, yellow red and orange. the lights did not project from the craft to the street or houses, but seemed to be stationary and quite bright . the craft looked like a kind of high tech toy like legos, but smooth all around and dark gray or black.
i started to move my car to leave, but was too curious about this, and turned my car around a half block down and went back to the location to get another look, and within seconds, the craft was already gone. the experience left me startled, and emotional. i have a yearning to share with people but i know they are skeptical. i am open to the possibilities because i have followed mufon for years and watch the history chanel. my husband had an experience as a teenager when he saw a ball of light that came very close to him in the late 1970's, hovered for about a minute 20 feet away, and then completely disappeared. he lived in anaheim hills, ca. it happened around 9 pm and at that time the area was fairly rural with new housing developments happening. he was sitting on the curb and he had never forgotten about that and the brightest light ball he's ever seen. still unexplainable.
content.summary: I was in my car at night on way home. noticed slow moving octagon shape craft moving above homes to my direct left. i stopped the car, did not get out. rolled window down to hear it. there was no noise. craft was black and around 20-30 ft around.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard. i heard a huge sound. i looked up and there it was. it was around 1 am. it was over the lake when i saw it. it was blue and green. i was very scared. then it shot off.
content.summary: A blue-green ufo that flashed light and was very loud

content.detailedDescription: 4:55 p.M. parked car in front of home,& my younger son outside of car looked up said "what is that?"then he  went in the house to get his binoculars, i looked up from inside car saw something dark/black up in the sky south west, son looked threw  binoculars said it looks really weird i looked threw  binoculars it was solid black some sort of ufo upside down boomerang not moving, two daughters looked threw  binoculars saw it as well my older daughter tried to take a picture with her camera but it is not a good camera for that height, i got the binoculars again to observe it a while it slowly turned to its side and it did not like a ufo but maybe a creature/alien? had a wispy tail like and wispy wings but not wings slow moving tentacles/arms/ very hard to describe but it is not like anything iv'e ever seen :o i then showed the same children and they saw as well.The thin arms/wispy tentacles moved in different forward directions i just watched it for a while two planes did pass not to far form it so it appeared to be the size of a huge airplane, then i had to leave i was late to meet a friend left at 5:29 p.M.It was still up in the sky when i left.
content.summary: Looked like ufo upside down boomerang  had a v on middle but when turned sideways looked like a creature of sort

content.detailedDescription: I was thirteen , and i had settled down in my families easy chair to watch bonanza. we had two dogs. a german shepard, and a beagle. almost as soon as i turned the television on, the dogs jumped up, and took off toward the front door. i had never heard them to be so excited. they were  snarling, and barking like the devil was at the door. naturally i i got up, and followed them. when i got out of the door they were standing there stone silent, and looking up. when i looked up, and i couldn't miss it there was a bright orange disc. one thing that made me jump up, and follow the dogs was that as they ran toward the door i heard a "whoosh" go over across the top of the house. it was just the sound of air moving, and that startled me because i figured that if it was a plane crossing above the house that i should have heard some engine noise. since i didn't, i wanted to see what was going on. now, i was outside, and there it was hanging silently in the air, at a height of 100 to 150ft. at the end of my driveway. the first thing that i did was to get out my monolux telescope. then i called my uncle on the phone who works for the f.B.I. to ask him if he had heard anything unusual. he told me that he also had heard the thing come over; but because of the trees around his house he didn't see it. that's when i told him to come over because it was hovering at the end of the driveway. the disc itself was probably between 60 to 80ft. in diameter. it had a bright orange glow, and an electric blue halo around it. i say electric blue because i had a neon sign transformer that i played with that produced the same blue color in it's arc. the thing was too bright to comfortably watch through the telescope; but when my aunt , and uncle got there, my mom made coffee for everybody, and we sat on the steps and watched it. i ran out to a position directly under it, and i noticed five dark spots in the arrangement of a pentagram around it's center. i don't know what the spots were; but they were the only break in it its' otherwise brilliant surface. personally, i don't know why people are frightened by seeing ships or visitors form another world. i found it to be a fascinating experience. after about forty five minutes, as i watched it from below, it shot skyward, and in less than two seconds it was gone. i asked my uncle if he thought that we should report the sighting, and he said no. now that i am dying i want to report it so that other people will know that we are not alone in the universe.
content.summary: It was an eye opening experience,and someone who has had an experience such as this will never be the same again.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were out walking the dog after dark, around 8pm. through the trees i saw what appeared to be lights moving across the sky, i first thought it was an aircraft and the branches of the trees were breaking up my view of it.  as we topped the hill and the trees were no longer covering the sky we both were frozen in our tracks to witness what we were seeing.  the lights (6 of them) were slowly turning on and off in a sequence, one after the other from right to left but the timing was so that one would be starting to glow as the last one was still fading away.  first instinct told us this must be an aircraft and the atmosphere was playing tricks on our eyes. until the sequence started again, from the beginning all the way to the right. at this point i could make out that these lights were on a large mass, which was very dark but seemed to be reflecting some starlight on its top surface (allowing me to make out the vague shape).  the object appeared to be several miles away and was well over 500 ft in width. after several sequences the lights stopped and i could still make out the silhouette of the mass, but it seemed to fade away or just left, it was hard to make out.  
i will say that the area in which it was seen was over a military base that we live near but we have never seen any aircraft of any kind except the occasional helicopter.  whatever this was, it was large, the lights seemed to be signaling something, and it made no sound.
my wife and i were both very shaken up by this event.  it had a strange vibe to it, maybe not bad but certainly unsettling.
content.summary: Large dark mass with six lights that pulsated in a slow sequence

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i hope this info i am to share with you gets reviewed. my name is paul i, and about 35 years ago i saw a 15 foot round ball of fire on a hill at night during a rain storm 150 yards from where i saw sleeping, went out to investigate the spot where i saw the fire ball the morning and saw an impression in the gravel/dirt, the location was an old gold mine in northern ca. 25 years had passed and i had an alien chip implant self-extract from by back, it was a small blackish/brown roundish 1/8" ovoid hard as a rock ball with white veins, just like dr leir had filmed and reported. 6 months later i found 2 steel studs on the top of my head that are still there. about 1 year later i woke up with dried blood behind my left ear, 3 months later i found 4 small alien chips in my outer edge of my left ear lobe that are still there. every 2 weeks for the past 2 years i have my left ear go bizerk with what sounds like a machine is downloading info from me with all kinds of radio signal sounds. 8 months ago i was sleeping and was woken up around 2 am by a warm round bright beam of light was scanning over my body and i could not move but felt no danger and kind of a peaceful feeling, 5 weeks ago the same thing happened. 3 weeks ago i woke in the night to go to the bathroom and i saw a 3 finger glow in the dark hand print on the door frame to the bathroom, the left hand print hand had two 5" long fingers with bulbous finger tips and 1 fat long thumb, the 2 long fingers were bright red glow in the dark with orange veins and the thumb was glow in the dark orange with red veins, i turned on the light to see it and it disappeared then turn off the light and sure enough it was there, i starred at it for about 15 minutes and the next day it was gone, too hard to photograph. several times the door to the outside is found open in the morning with no explanation. i am sure more things will happen again.
content.summary: Round ball of fire

content.detailedDescription: about to step inside. dark out. decided to admire the stars for a second. was looking directly above when i thought i saw part of a plane far above moving fast. after a second i noticed the triangle outline and knew what it was. flew in a straight line fairly slowly. looked identical to the outline of other triangular craft but had lightish blue lines or markings on the bottom. it was very exciting. immediately i ran inside to grab a phone to tell someone. passed directly over my house and i was at the door outside so after it was above the house.
content.summary: Triangle with blue lined markings on bottom passed directly above my house.

content.detailedDescription: Leaving knightstown at 815 pm from morgan street going to 40 looked up and saw a shadow looking thing following me looked like a boomer and /triangle had a smoky cloud around it no lights or noise had about 6 to 8 little windows and dim lights on the inside. it was so dark out i loss sight of it.
content.summary: Shadow looking boomerang hovering over car in the dark dim lights on the inside no lights or noise on out side

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on i-20 east bound around 9pm through stephenville tx when i observed a white boomerang shaped object demonstrating what looked a crash course toward the ground heading southeast to northwest over the highway. the object was very detailed and bright but did not give off a starry glow like something on fire or a star would. the observation was 2 seconds or less and the object seemed to disappear before a close impact rather than crash. the object was either very large or very close. my pov would have been that the object was 2 inches in width and an inch or so in length. altitude was either very low or again, would had to have been enormous in size.
content.summary: Was either very large or very close, it glowed bright white but did not shine like a star would.

content.detailedDescription: 6:40 pm looking east. i first heard a humming noise coming from outside. i have observed a lot of aircraft latelyi then proceeded to open up a window and see a blue disc shaped craftthe craft began to rise and eventually became out of view, i had to proceed to the back of my residents to get a good view since it flew directly overhead, i then noticed a helicopter in the nearby area not in the same path but enough to where it could observe the craft, once i was able to see the craft again it was not blue it was red green white flashing lights different patterns not the same very bright flashing very quickly.The helicopter eventually flew out of you but i could still see the craft it continued on the same path until it became out of you because of the clouds.
content.summary: A disk shaped craft that glowed blue than changed color rapidly. flashing

content.detailedDescription: . i was at my parents house in my old bedroom. i was lying on my left side facing a window. i went to bed probably around 1 am and i couldn't have been asleep more than a couple minutes when i woke up and i was paralyzed or something.  i couldn't move my body at all and i remember this happening to me when i was 19 at my grandmothers house. on that occasion i got very scared and it felt like there was something watching me or something. then i heard someone whisper my name loudly. it sounded like it was coming from inside and outside my head. it said "cody" which is my nickname from birth. that is the name most people know me by. anyway back to the latest incident. like i was saying i remembered this feeling and i didn't like it. i began to feel scared and that in turn made me frustrated and angry because i just wanted to go to sleep. i think the anger is what helped me snap out of the "paralysis". so i snapped out of it and immediately went back to sleep after about a minute or two. again i wake up after no more than another couple of minutes and again i am "paralyzed". still lying on left side facing window. it took a bit longer to snap out of it this time but i did. again getting angry at feeling afraid. i got up and smoked a cigarette and went back to bed and fell right back asleep this time lying on my right side. this 3rd and final time i wake again "paralyzed" but no matter how hard i try i cant snap out of it. this is where thing get "crazy" as i've so often been called when i tell this to people though thankfully some believe me. something touches the back of my head. i feel the pressure of it. no noticeable temperature change. this freaks me out and i can only describe my feelings as abject terror. there is an odor that is strange but not bad. the odor seems to be familiar and unfamiliar at the same time. like fresh cut grass and cinnamon/spices along with something i cant identify. i found out later from some website that 90 percent of people who report a contact experience say they smelled an incense like or spices like smell during the encounter. i about fell off my chair when i read that. any way i was freaking out inside and tried to reach back with my right arm to hit or grab whatever was there and i tried to scream for my mom but all that happened was my middle finger twitched (my hand was in my line of sight) and i made a gurgling sound. then a blue hand with what looked like a thumb and two fingers reached around in front of my face and slowly put its hand on my mouth. as soon as it touched me i felt peace and realized that everything was ok. then it disappeared. i am running out of time on this computer because im at a library using it so im cutting this a little short but that's the jist of it. i no know for a fact there is something out there and i feel priveliged
content.summary: Not a ufo event. i was touched by an something and there was a strange odor

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
in backyard with camera on tripod hoping to see comet lovejoy but just settled on testing my camera and aiming at the nearest bright star.

2. what made you first notice the object?
i only noticed it after the 3rd shot with an exposer of 10 seconds each and noticed it was not moving in the same direction as the main and backgroud stars i photographed.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
lens flare or dust on my lens but moved camera to another object and it was not there.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
the object could only be seen through the long camera exposure of 10 seconds. without moving the camera, background stars drifted to the right while the object appeard to stay in play but was actually drifting to the left.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it was very cold out and waiting 15 to 20 seconds before taking the next shot starting had my fingers freezing so i went inside.

i will be uploading 15 pictures and it would be best viewed as a photo slidshow. the image is oblong ( looks like a comet)located in the middle bottom of each shot.  ignore image on some of the pictures located far right in the middle, it's just a tree branch.

it appears that i'm only allowed 10 uploads.
content.summary: Caught image with digital camera while taking series photos of a star

content.detailedDescription: We wer'e taking pic's of the fire on the sun event which we were late for but anyway i started seeing something blue in my cam my friend said she didn't have it in hers.. it desended from the sky and i keep taking pic then it just flew off like a tiny spaceship or something i have caught it several times after that in the same area i believe it is a spirit orb or something it can't be something on my lens which is what people say but i used different camera's and saw it again...Maybe u can tell me what it is!!!
content.summary: It looks like a blue orb i have it in pic but i can't see it with my eye

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road. the skies were clear and blue. saw a glimmer in the sky. joked to myself about a ufo. after a few minutes started to realize it wasn't an airplane or helicopter. it was a domed triangle. like a triangle with no corners. silver in color and very shiny. lost sight of the object when i passed a tree. pulled over to the side of the road to see if i could reestablish visual, but was unsuccessful.
content.summary: Saw a domed triangular object erratically hovering around.

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were driving back from wv to wilmington, we had just got on i40 at winston salem a little earlier and were around exit 105 heading east. i remember seeing the high point airport sign, looking up and see a very long row of very bright lights hovering over the interstate, slowly moving, for a second we thought it was a plane, no, too slow and planes look nothing like that, as we got closer we thought, maybe a helicopter, then again very quickly ruled that out (i was in air traffic control school in 2013, i know that no plane or helicopter moved like that, looked like that, or would be over the interstate that low)as we continued to drive we kept staring at it and it continued to hover over the interstate slowly moving to the other side, by the time we got near it, it was already on the other side and descending slowly almost like it was landing somewhere over there, however we went under a bridge and lost sight of it because it was extremely low and behind us. a specific detail i do recall is that as i was staring at it, trying to distinguish it as an airplane or helicopter i realized the row of lights were so bright, it seemed like that was all that it was, was lights until i noticed a very deep dark black almost black haze as the color of whatever was emitting the lights. this was also seen by my roommates and i must add, neither of us drink or do drugs so this was not a hallucination, i have a lot of knowledge about most all aircrafts and drones and i can firmly say that this was not anything like that to my knowledge. this incident lasted maybe 2 minutes maximum and i remember being mesmerized by it, feeling like oh my god, does everyone see this? can it really be a ufo just completely plain in the open, i remember feeling compelled to report this because i wanted so badly to know what it was, i so badly wanted to turn my car around and find it but didn't know what exit to take because i had already passed it. we can not have been the only ones to see this, this was clearly right in plain view on a clear, windy, freezing cold night. i wanted to take pictues but i was driving and by the time it occurred to film it, it had passed because i was so in awe and confused as to what was happening.
content.summary: Driving with roomate on i40 saw very long row of bright lights hovering low over interstate.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo is recorded in photo taken the night of october 7, 2014, the 18:56, the day that we had the super moon.
it seems curious, but as ufosfacts administrator never had the opportunity to personally register any event related to the ufo phenomenon, but this time, even if unintentionally, i just recorded something interesting about the city of porto alegre as he took a photo of the super moon. as was a photo which was dismissed for lack of focus, ended up being forgotten in my cell. today during the cleaning process, where the delete memory card files, this picture came on the laptop screen and a bright spot called attention once visualized the picture.
i remember clearly have not seen anything in the sky when i took the photo, i asked my wife who was with me this time and got the same answer. hardly a light of this size would unnoticed for those who watched an object on the side.

as the seat of ufosfacts is in porto alegre, i saw that it would be interesting to share.

at the same time started an analysis to rule out all possibilities of a possible mistake.

enlarging the picture, we can see clearly that this is not a common aircraft. we can also see a mist that seem vortices formed by compression of the air, suggesting a downward movement.

analysis details

aircraft (aircraft / helicopter) - thrown, the object does not display navigation lights and was not visible to the human eye when the photo.
rain - no chances of water drops on the lens because the weather was dry and clear
reflections - no, because the lens is flat 3.5mm and equipped with anti-reflection system.
outdoor lighting (buildings - lampposts) - at the photo you can see that there are no buildings or poles or even mountains, as in this direction there is any kind of elevation.
exposure - the photo was hit with an exposure of 1/10, that is 0.001 seconds, so was also discarded

we received information from more than 3 witnesses also testified the object.

contact the international airport salgado filho flight control department, we received information that nothing was detected on radar, but an anonymous source reported receiving a phone call asking about the strange light.
content.region: State of Rio Grande do Sul
content.summary: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.locationName: Porto Alegre, State of Rio Grande do Sul

content.detailedDescription: It was about 7:15-7:20 in the evening, jan, 6th, 2015 .I was laying on our bed, curtains were open although it was dark outside. i noticed two orange amber colored lights from the direction of the mountains. the santa rita range in the east. at first i thought there were two large fires up by the wrightson observatory. so i got up and went outside where i noticed two more orbs. i called to my husband to come out and see. by the time he got outside there were 6 to 7 of them still by the mountains. some were stationary (hovering) and some moved slowly. i felt highly agitated and restless. i ran around to the front yard to see if i could see more and maybe an even better view, but couldn't, so ran back into the backyard where my husband and i watched them for a couple minutes. then suddenly they were gone but they didn't fade out, it seemed they blinked out, but i do not recall seeing the actual blinking out or on of them. they were just there and then not. it felt like a skip, like i missed that action of them appearing and disappearing. this left me feeling strange and disoriented. it still does. the following evening we went outside at the same time just in case we saw it again, but we saw nothing.
content.summary: I noticed two orange globes from bedroom window.Husband and i went outside and saw more. there were 6-7 orangey globes. they lasted for about 5 to 7 mins.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi
i'm unable to really fill in any of the above because what happened was more of an event than anything structural etc 
i was driving home from work on monday dec 22nd 2014 after a night shift coming out from leeds on kirkstall rd facing horsforth. it was still dark.
all of a sudden in front of me the sky lit up (trumann show style) as if somebody had switched the sun on. after only maybe a couple of seconds it went dark again.
my wife who was at home at the time also witnessed the event.
i've made enquiries to local papers and television news programmes as well as people around the area with no luck as to what this phenomenon was.
i am hoping other people may have reported this to yourselves or other similar web sites.

regards

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: Driving east down pine street in madison and saw what i thought were fireworks or a flare. but it stopped exactly in middle of street and i stopped car and thought that is no flare. it was just above trees and i watched it for like 2 to 3 minutes, then cars coming the other way made me move forward to side of street. rolled down window and heard nothing. after another minute or so it moved north or to my left the same direction it came. i drove forward and it was at my 90 degrees so my distance is pretty accurate. i quickly made two left turn and heading into town with it on my right. while it was at my 90 degrees it was moving slow and steady off to the north or to the schools direction, and out of sight. i saw two guys walking and went to gas station and told the guy i saw something odd, to say the least. then the two guys walked in and i asked did you see that light and they said yeah what was that, i said it was a little ball of fire. oh i was an aircraft crew chief in the air force for almost 12 years, so i know what i saw.
content.summary: It flew left to right then stopped in line with street. hovered for up to 4 minutes then flew left till out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving southbound on highway 101 in carlsbad, ca at approximately 9:25 pm, the air was clear and i can see the lights off in the distance of point loma near san diego clearly. i often drive at night along the beaches to check the surf. a red glowing object flew directly over my car. i thought that it was a meteorite because of the brightness and the way that it seemed to blur as it moved across the sky flying directly southbound along highway 101. i was driving at a speed of 50 miles per hour and i assumed that it would burn out seconds after i saw it, but it did not, it continued on, in a straight trajectory, not losing any altitude. 
	the next thought that i had was that it was going as fast as a missile and, living in oceanside, ca near camp pendleton, it may have come from there. my confusion turned to concern, knowing that it had no other flashing lights like the jets that land at carlsbad airport or the commercial jets that fly southbound along the coast over the ocean. the only other aircrafts that fly along the coast above the land are the police helicopters that fly over head at times, but mostly over the water. 
	i continued following it down the coast, rarely taking my eyes off of it so as to keep my car on the road. the light was very bright at first, like a meteorite, bigger than venus when you can see it on a clear night and it’s closest to the earth. i had kept my eyes on it for about 2 minutes when i saw that it had seemed to be flying over the sea world tower, approximately 30 miles away. i had reached leucadia and couldn’t see past the cliffs at this point but at my last view it had traveled far enough so the light was just a speck in the distance.
	in my approximations, the light was about 1000 feet off the ground and traveling at a speed faster than the f15s from miramar air force base. 30 miles in 2 minutes would equal about 900 miles per hour. i felt a bit confused as to who to call, so i remembered that on ufo shows, people report sightings to their local police department. i called the encinitas sherrif dept and they gave me the number to the faa to call and report it. the number turned out to be the national ufo reporting center. my biggest concern was that it may have been a terrorist missile and with san diego being a military center, i would have thought that there would be some kind of f15 type flights trying to figure out what was flying so low. but nothing came around for over half an hour then a police helicoptor flew overhead making it's usual rounds of the coast.
content.summary: A fireball passed me directly overhead while driving southbound on hwy 101 and continued directly south over san diego 30 miles away

content.detailedDescription: Ok first i was craving a cigarerte. i went out to my car to get a pack i had left. i then went to sit at the stairs by my apartment and was looking at my phone listening to music and smoking. when i finished i decided to stay out for a minute and look up at the sky. i had always remembered that if you look hard enough your eyes will adjust and you can see better. i noticed when i looked up i could see an actual satalite. i then started to look lower in the sky. i   then saw a white light that look like a planet. it 2 feint lights protruding a feint beem on each side but i eventually stopped looking at it because it wasn't moving. ok. then i saw a a strait up orange object that was slightly similar to the white one but much closer and lower in the sky from my point of view. it was moving in a strait line and caught all of my attention. i could see it very very clearly. the moon was very bright and i could almost see good detail of it. i knew it wasn't anything else other than a ufo. i know for a fact it was one. it was a saucer. not an airplane or any of that. i do live by john wayne but i know it wasn't an "identified" fo. pleae email a response if you have any questions.
content.summary: Smoking and saw a ufo strait up.

content.detailedDescription: This is not my first sighting, but my very practical husband saw this too! in fact, i made a point of pointing out what was in the sky, so i could ensure it wasn"nt just me seeing what i was seeing!
content.summary: It hung in space,thought it was a star or planet or spacestation, now it's gone!

content.detailedDescription: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]] i've posted the video - i saw it and filmed it - it's on you tube site called [youtube title removed/cms/tg]]; the video was posted today on 1/7/15. i just looked up and saw this trail flaming across the beautiful blue sky above downtown los angeles. i know on 1/6/15, yesterday, an article and picture was very similar to my video - enjoy and thx. please share this if anyone would care to comment please do so!
content.summary: Bright trail ascending bout 100 feet long.

content.detailedDescription: One night i walked out my back door to smoke and i seen 3 bright glowing redish/orangeish lights, they were in a row they were hovering over a golf course. i hollerd for my fiance and when i turned back around and one of the lights sky rockted. my fiance got to see the last two we got video of them it was quite interesting, something i have never encountered.
content.summary: 3 bright glowing redish orangeish lights in a row hovering over a golf course one dissapered, flashed off rather within a blink of an eye. something i have never seen before we have video.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in my hot tub facing south east.  to the south east and straight up it seemed clear and i saw many starts.  to the west i didn't notice any stars, but that seems to be the norm.  maybe more light pollution.  

very cold night and my ears where cold so i move to the other side of hot tub, because that's where the lid is.  thought it would block the wind a little better.  

when i did that i looked up toward the south west and saw what looked like stars, daily faint, shaped in a v, not a triangle, but a v.  i couldn't believe what i was seeing, but it was moving toward the south east.  i watched it for about 5 seconds move out of sight.

have no idea how high, how big, but seemed to have 5 or so stars on each side.

i was using my iphone with speaker to listen to the radio.  never had time to take photo, but i grabed my phone to text my daughter to tell her what i saw.  as soon as i grabed my phone the speaker stopped, and the phone showed no battery.  i went in the house, plugged the phone in and it immediately showed 54 percent charge.
content.summary: Looked like stars moving in v pattern about 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
On the way to a gas station in northern durham, north carolina, my girlfriend and i witnessed an extremely bright hovering object, amber in color.  we decided to drive around to get a better view of it over the treetops and witnessed what looked like a triangular light pattern -- one very large, very bright amber light in the nose and a smaller flashing light on each wingtip and center which stayed illuminated but strobed brighter in order from left to right.  it passed in the opposite direction of our car.  because it was so far away we could not make out any structure.  the large light was unlike anything we had seen in the sky before in terms of its size and brightness.  once it was out of view we continued to the gas station.   

on the way back to the house we saw the object again, hovering back close to its original position.  it was much closer and we turned into a neighborhood to get a good look:

the object was very close.  i would compare it to watching a plane in take-off pass overhead in terms of its distances.  as we pulled into the neighborhood it stopped hovering and began moving -- drifting might be a more fitting verb -- across the sky towards us.  we parked the car and got out as the object passed directly overhead.  as it did we both witnessed the solid black outline of an equilateral diamond:  a small white running light in the center and at each tip with an over-sized, amber-colored seemingly directional (forward to forward-down) light at its nose and a significantly dimmer light on its tail.  the three lights from wingtip to wingtip constantly strobed in a right-to-left direction as it moved away from us.  the object was silent as it passed over and disappeared behind the treeline.

we jumped back into our car to try and get a better angle to continue watching it but as we circled the woods which it had passed over it was nowhere in sight -- until we happened to catch the faint strobe of the object now a great distance away.

we drove to my girlfriend's parents' house and watched this object glide back and forth across the sky at a great distance -- like a commercial plane at altitude -- for over an hour.  at one point her mother came outside to watch it pass at about 45 degrees above the horizon close enough to make out the triangular front of the object.  we kept noticing that it seemed to pass in a straight line until we could not see it anymore and then begin its trajectory again from where it started -- but we never saw it fly back.  we assumed that we simply missed its return path.  finally we watched one disappear not behind trees but simply into the distance and made sure to watch for its return.  it never flew back.  suddenly it was once again close and over our left shoulders.  we were in disbelief that it could have 1) flown back to this position with such speed and 2) have done so without us noticing.

we tracked the object as it passed about 60 degrees above the horizon when suddenly we noticed a second, identical object flying towards us from a great distance.  we continued watching these two objects pass back across the sky.

the total sighting lasted from 9:20pm to 10:45pm.  which is to say that at 10:45pm i finally came inside out of the frigid cold to write this report.
content.summary: Equilateral diamond-shaped object with five surface lights which hovered and passed directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription: At around ten past ten on tuesday night, january 6 2015, i stepped onto the back verandah to see what the weather was doing and to get a bit of cool night air. the moon was just starting to appear above the trees at the back of our property (to the south), there was little in the way of cloud and the stars were blazing. we are on the coast in country new south wales; the sky here is not obscured by the glow of street lights. when i was looking at the stars, i observed what appeared to be a faint white star like dot racing across the sky (higher than commercial planes fly) - at first i concluded that it was a satellite, but than it suddenly turned to the east and swiftly moved out of view. i have never known satellites to do this before, so i am left puzzling over what this object was.
content.summary: Appeared to be a satellite at first, but then abruptly changed direction.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of january 5, 2015, at about 6:12 pm, i noticed a very bright light with many rays that were pulsing as it stayed bright and moved in a southwesterly direction.  it continued to travel in that direction while i was on woods chapel road heading west toward highway 291.   it seemed to have continued in the distance and then i lost sight briefly until i was nearing the intersection of todd george rd.  

now i saw what initially appeared to be two bright car lights (horizontal to each other) from off in the distance down todd george as i looked in a southerly direction.  but as the lights neared, they seemed to just float at about 45° angle from the horizon, somewhere between a ¼ mile and ½ a mile away to the south.  i had to stop watching as the stoplight turned and proceeded to cross the bridge so that i could get onto highway 291 and travel south toward the heart of lee’s summit.

when i was in my lane on 291, i noticed the two lights had followed and were also travelling in a southerly direction.  but now the two lights were vertical to each other.  they were ½ a mile away i was later to note.  they were at an angle of about 35° from the horizon.  then the two lights had become three as i realized i had seen the edge of a triangle because the third light had raised up from behind the other two lights.   

the triangle was very clear and in fact had faint lighted red lines that connected the bright corner lights.  then the triangle would shift in the air, moving to a side-on plane, and then move again with the triangle fully obvious.   it seemed to make these changes each time that i would look at them.  but of course i had to keep my eyes on the highway.  the triangle was about 7° or arc in size.

the triangle followed my direction of travel in a parallel path to mine, but finally stopped near colbern road as i crossed it.  it hovered in the air for a while as i continued on, but then i lost sight of it as i continued on my path.   i was very sorry that i had not been able to photograph this.  it was truly spectacular!.

as with my may 1, 2014 sighting and june 19 sightings of triangular craft, this stayed in the same approximate area as those triangles.  always, it shunned developed areas and stayed basically in the lake jacomo area with the deviation to todd george in that large uninhabited area.  there is a chance that the two lights were the same craft.  in fact, they seem to intersect at the bottom of the map.

due to the angle of incidence of 35° and knowing the distance from highway 291 to todd george road, i can calculate the height of the craft, and even its approximate size.   it was about 1800 feet altitude, and the size was about 230 feet from base to top of the triangle.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying triangle near lake jacomo

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family was at an outside city park event- "shakespeare in the park" in the summer of 1994 and i was lying on my stomach watching the production and my arms got tired so i rolled over and onto my back and my eyes were directed upward and i saw a green neon triangle that appeared to be very high in the atmosphere- no cloud cover- dark night- but very clearly visible and size of quarter- i observed for few seconds then elbowed my 7 year old son- and pointed for him to look up- he craned his neck around then flipped over on his back and was able to observe with me for a second or two before object darted off in sw direction at incomprehensible speed. we didn't speak of it for over a decade- then one day i asked him if he remembered and he did and i asked him what he saw and he described exactly what i remembered- -then about another decade later i did the same thing and his response was the same, the second time he was around 27 yrs. old. it was very bright glowing green neon and was still when i first observed it and stayed that way for about 6-7 seconds total before it too off to southwest at a level of acceleration that is still not explicable based on what the normal person knows exists. it eventually sparked an interest in the subject for me...My son doesn't like to remember/think or talk about it. i have mentioned it only a few times during the past two decades...But a few years ago i read something about triangle green neon ufos in indian during that time period and i was so blown away- because at the time i had never heard anyone describe a triangle-shaped or neon- much less green neon triangle-shaped ufo- and wished i had reported it earlier. there is no reason for me to draw it- it was just as stated.
content.summary: At outside hakespear in the park
